name: Gran Turismo 2: Music at the Speed of Sound: The Album [Bonus Playstation Disc]
overview: GT2: Music at the Speed of Sound features music used on the soundtrack of the Playstation video game Gran Turismo 2, plus a bonus disc of extras that includes hints for dedicated players and demos for newcomers Includes Bonus PlayStation Disc: - Playable Demo - Exclusive Downloadable Codes - Cool Movies - Tips From the Pros - Sneak Preview Of GT2000 For PlayStation 2 - Interview With GT2 Production Team
